title: 'Planet of the Apes 3' Adds Steve Zahn as a War Ape
text:
Published By: MovieWeb.com: Movie News - Today 
Steve Zahn has signed on to play a brand new ape in 20th Century Fox's 'War for the Planet of the Apes'....
